Package sorcer.platform.logger

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RemoteLoggerAppender
    Publish log to remote logger service through a queue.
    RemoteLoggerClient
    Reads the log message queue.
    RemoteLoggerInstaller
    Install RemoteLoggerAppender in Logback
